content: desktop buddies cactus cutie hi i did this as a scrap yarn project so a lot of the labels have been lost and i can t give you exact colors and brands but that s okay this is a little piece of art and you should absolutely make it your own using colors you love or think look amazing i can tell you that i mostly have red heart red heart with love and i love this yarn but again i m not sure what brands and specific colors are used for this project so just have fun supplies worsted weight yarn 5 0mm hook 4 0mm hook 3 5mm hook 9mm safety eyes abbreviations mc magic_ring slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet increase 2 stitches crocheted into same stitch decrease two stitches crocheted together aka decrease blo back loop only flo front loop only bpdc back post half_double_crochet fpdc front post double_crochet page 1 of 20 a happy hooker and her yarn cactus body using the color of yarn you want your cactus and a 3 5mm hook chain 26 r1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook chain 1 turn 25 r2-23 single_crochet across in blo ch1 turn 25 r24 match row 1 and row 23 to form a tube single_crochet across using the empty chains of row 1 and blo of row 23 cut yarn leaving a long tail for sewing up the top of the cactus weave the tail around the opening and pull to gather closed continue sewing around the opening until it is closed 3-4 times or more if you want once you have the top closed up you can bring your tail to the inside of the cactus and knot it off page 2 of 20 a happy hooker and her yarn insert 9mm safety eyes about 8-9 stitches from bottom of your cactus i put them in a valley and space them with 3 peaks and 2 valleys or about 5 row apart split a piece of black yarn in 2 sew a small mouth between the eyes dirt connect dark brown anywhere along the open end of your cactus and single_crochet 25 stitches around join to beginning stitch ch1 and single_crochet single_crochet 2sc around to end 37 finish off leaving a long tail that you will use to connect your cactus to the pot the counts aren t that important as long as your dirt reaches the inside edges of your pot cactus arm using the same color you used for your cactus body and a 3 5mm hook *note when i begin i start with a long tail so that i can use that tail to attach the arm to the main body chain 10 r1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook ch1 turn 9 r2-17 single_crochet across in blo ch1 turn 9 r18 match row 1 and row 17 to form a tube single_crochet across using the empty chains of row 1 and blo of row 17 finish
